title: Kevin Briscoe
text: Kevin Charles Briscoe (20 August 1936 – 1 April 2009) was a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. A <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Scrum-half">halfback</a>, Briscoe represented at a provincial level, and was a member of the New Zealand national side, the <a href="All%20Blacks">All Blacks</a>, from 1959 to 1964. He played 43 matches for the All Blacks—three of which were as captain—including nine internationals.
